category.name: Administration.Access Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ADA_allow_users_in_any_group
preference.preference_description: Defines the default behavior when determining if a user is associated with an ADA License. Valid values are: * true: Will match a user on an ADA License independent of the group attached to the license. * false: Will match a user on an ADA License only if they have logged into Teamcenter with the group attached to the license. This is the default value.
